class Person:
    def __init__(self, name, age, email=None):
        """
        Initializes a Person object.


        Args:
            name (str): The name of the person.
            age (int): The age of the person.
            email (str, optional): The email address of the person. Defaults to None.
        """
        self.name = name
        self.age = age
        self.email = email
